author: jfarcand
msg: Ugly workaround for the "ClassNotFound" Exception that occurs under Solaris/j2se 1.4.x. SSL is curently broken without this hack.
Please revert the patch if you have a better idea.

author: costin
msg: First - make some extra checks on the file - try to create if it doesn't
exists, or remove it if it exists. This will avoid permission problems.
Second - fix the infinite loop that happens on a permission problem case.

author: costin
msg: Make sure init is called, better messages.
